input.description: operator[Required] The 'operator' tag specifies the operand for key and value specified. Valid values - equals, not equals, like, in

key[Required] This tag contains the alert attribute by which the alerts are filtered. Valid values for this tag can be any of the alert attributes such as: name, description, id etc. You can use Find Alert By ID to get the list of all the alert attributes.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <criteria-expressions> <xsl:if test="string('${key}') != ''"> <criteria-expression> <key> <xsl:value-of select="string('${key}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </key> <value> <xsl:if test="string('${value}') != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string('${value}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> <operator> <xsl:if test="string('${operator}') != ''"> <xsl:value-of select="string('${operator}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </operator> </criteria-expression> </xsl:if> </criteria-expressions> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
